fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`FCOM m32fp`
`FCOM m64fp`
`FCOM ST(i)`
`FCOM`
`FCOMP m32fp`
`FCOMP m64fp`
`FCOMP ST(i)`
`FCOMP`
`FCOMPP`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Compares the contents of register ST(0) and source value and sets condition code flags C0, C2, and C3 in the FPU status word according to the results (see the table below). The source operand can be a data register or a memory location. If no source operand is given, the value in ST(0) is compared with the value in ST(1). The sign of zero is ignored, so that –0.0 is equal to +0.0.

footer.text: Thanks to Felix Cloutier for the online x86 reference
